restaurants.name: Riverhorse on Main
restaurants.description: Park City's most distinguished fine dining restaurant, operating as a 16-year Forbes Four Star Award winner. Located on the second floor of a historic Main Street building with a famous patio overlooking the heart of downtown. Features live music nightly at 7pm and a perpetually rotating seasonal menu.

restaurants.name: Apex at Montage Deer Valley
specialties: Beef Tartare w/ roasted bone marrow
restaurants.description: Montage Deer Valley's signature restaurant that transforms into 'Apex Steak' each evening. Features unique Alpenglobes for 90-minute enclosed outdoor dining experiences with panoramic Deer Valley views. Executive Chef Kevin Hee brings progressive twists to traditional American steakhouse classics.

restaurants.name: Courchevel Bistro
specialties: Baked Brie w/ Park City Creamery cheese
restaurants.description: Named after Park City's sister city in the French Alps and housed in the historic Coal & Lumber building. Executive Chef Clement Gelas, who actually grew up in Courchevel, France, brings authentic French-European cuisine. CNN Travel named it one of the 'World's Best New Restaurants for 2020.'

restaurants.name: The Mariposa

contact.address: 7600 Royal Street, Silver Lake Lodge, Park City, UT 84060

restaurants.description: Zagat's #1 rated restaurant in Utah, located at 8,100 feet elevation in Silver Lake Lodge. Offers an intimate tasting room dining experience with 6- and 8-course menus highlighting decadent ingredients and seasonal local products. Only operates during ski season, making reservations highly coveted.

restaurants.name: The Eating Establishment
restaurants.description: Park City's oldest full-service restaurant since 1972, serving three generations of families. Famous for 'breakfast all day' concept that kids especially love - you can order pancakes at dinner time! Features a kids menu with photos so little ones can pick what they want even if they can't read yet.

restaurants.name: Silver Star Café

contact.address: 1825 Three Kings Drive, Park City, UT 84060

restaurants.description: Award-winning 'Hidden Gem' featured on Food Network's Diners, Drive-ins & Dives. True mom-and-pop operation where kids grew up in restaurants and now help run it. 360-degree mountain views with safe outdoor patio where little ones can wander while waiting for food. Live acoustic music Thu-Sat evenings.

restaurants.name: Grub Steak Restaurant
specialties: Prime Rib (as big as the plate)
restaurants.description: Park City's longest standing steakhouse since 1976. Famous for an amazing kids menu that includes salmon, steak, and baby back ribs - not just chicken fingers. The legendary 45-item salad bar is included with all dinners. Head chef Brian is the longest tenured chef in Utah, with live country music Thu-Sat.

restaurants.name: Hearth & Hill
restaurants.description: Family-owned 'gathering spot' since 2018 by father-son duo. Elevated kids menu includes kid-friendly steak and fish dishes, not just typical fare. Children under 2 get complimentary buttered noodles. Contemporary American cuisine with global flair, from Korean fried chicken to build-your-own Old Fashioned.

restaurants.name: High West Saloon
specialties: House-Made Pretzel with Whiskey Beer Cheese
restaurants.description: World's only ski-in distillery located at the bottom of Quittin' Time ski run. Historic 1870s saloon atmosphere with award-winning whiskeys and elevated pub fare. Walk-in only, expect waits during ski season.

restaurants.name: The Bridge Cafe & Grill

contact.address: 825 Main Street, Suite 201 Upper Deck, Park City, UT 84060

restaurants.description: Brazilian-American fusion restaurant with ski-in/ski-out access at Town Lift base. Features sunny patio with slope views and all-day breakfast. $2 sliders and hot dogs every Sunday & Thursday.

restaurants.name: Umbrella Bar

contact.address: 3720 N Sundial Court, Canyons Village, Park City, UT

restaurants.description: 360-degree views from glass enclosure with massive outdoor deck in center of Canyons Village. Walking distance from Red Pine Gondola in ski boots. Perfect communal après-ski atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Collie's Sports Bar & Grill
specialties: Town Lift Burger with Bleu Cheese
restaurants.description: Park City's only dedicated sports bar with 25+ TVs and all sports packages. Family owned & operated with dog-friendly patio. Sound dogs allow table-specific audio.

restaurants.name: Après Pendry

contact.address: 2417 West High Mountain Road, Park City, UT 84098

restaurants.description: Centrally located lobby lounge with European-inspired mountainside socializing atmosphere. Indoor/outdoor seating with roaring fireplace and live music events.

restaurants.name: RIME Oyster Bar

contact.address: Top of Deer Valley's Jordanelle Gondola, Deer Valley Resort

specialties: Oysters on half-shell ($2.50 during happy hour)
restaurants.description: World's only slopeside raw bar located in refurbished cabin at top of Deer Valley's Jordanelle Gondola. Prime time is 2-3pm for $2.50 oyster happy hour.

restaurants.name: Five5eeds

contact.address: 1600 Snow Creek Drive EF, Park City, UT 84060

specialties: Avocado Toast with Feta & Chili Jam
Aussie-style Iced Coffee with Ice Cream
restaurants.description: Australian-owned breakfast spot importing coffee from Melbourne. Famous for hotcakes with edible flowers and mascarpone. Expect long waits on weekends (1+ hours) but worth it. Waitlist system only.

restaurants.name: Harvest
restaurants.description: Australian-style cafe with partnership with local Idle Hands Roasting Co. Locally-sourced ingredients with many gluten-free/vegan options. Perfect pre-ski location near Town Lift Plaza.

restaurants.name: The Eating Establishment
restaurants.description: Oldest full-service restaurant in Park City (since 1972) serving breakfast all day. Historic Main Street location with wood-burning fireplace. Local residents describe as 'excellent value with large portions.'

restaurants.name: Silver Summit Cafe

contact.address: 6065 Silver Creek Dr, Park City, UT 84098

specialties: Big Burrito with choice of meat
restaurants.description: Local's secret spot located in 7-Eleven gas station with surprisingly good food. Most reasonable prices in Park City. Outdoor patio overlooking golf course. Don't be put off by location.

restaurants.name: Atticus Coffee & Teahouse
specialties: The Usual (bagel with cream cheese, avocado, everything seasoning)
restaurants.description: Part cafe, part bookstore with sliding library ladders and eco-conscious practices. Great terrace for watching Town Lift with funky ambiance and unique drink selections.

restaurants.name: Park City Bread & Bagel

contact.address: Located in Pinebrook, Park City, UT

restaurants.hours: Early morning opening for pre-ski breakfast
specialties: Spicy Sunrise (cheddar jalapeño bagel with bacon)
Black Diamond with jalapeño cream cheese
restaurants.description: Hand-rolled bagels made fresh with quick service perfect for pre-ski breakfast on Wasatch side. Watch latest ski/snowboard films while eating. Mini muffins offered with sandwiches.
